title: RumbleOn, Inc. (RMBL) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: RumbleOn, Inc. (NASDAQ:RMBL) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 11, 2025 4:30 PM ETCompany ParticipantsJerene Makia - Corporate ParticipantMichael A.
content:
Greetings, and welcome to the RumbleOn, Inc. Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Call. [Operator Instructions] As a reminder, this conference is being recorded. It is now my pleasure to introduce your host, Jerene Makia, Vice President of Finance. Thank you. Please go ahead.

Thank you, Chloe. Good afternoon, everyone, and thank you for joining us on this conference call to discuss RumbleOn's second quarter 2025 financial results. Joining me on the call today is Michael Quartieri, RumbleOn's Chairman, Chief Executive Officer and Interim Chief Financial Officer. Our Q2 results are detailed in the press release we issued this afternoon and supplemental information will be available in our Form 10-Q once filed.

Before we start, I would like to remind you that the following discussion contains forward-looking statements including, but not limited to, RumbleOn's market opportunities and future financial results and involve risks and uncertainties that may cause actual results to differ materially from those discussed here. Additional information that could cause actual results to differ from forward- looking statements can be found in RumbleOn's periodic and other SEC filings. The forward-looking statements and risks in this conference call, including responses to your questions, are based on current expectations as of today, and RumbleOn assumes no obligation to update or revise them whether as a result of new developments or otherwise, except as required by law.

Also, the following discussion contains non-GAAP financial measures. For a reconciliation of these non-GAAP financial measures please see our earnings release issued earlier today.

Now I'll turn the call over to Michael
summary: RumbleOn, Inc. is hosting a conference call to discuss its second quarter 2025 financial results. The company's results are detailed in a press release and will be available in the form of a Form 10-Q once filed. The discussion of these calls includes forward-looking statements about the company's market opportunities and future financial results, which are subject to numerous risks and uncertainties. The following discussion also includes non-GAAP financial measures.
shortSummary: RumbleOn's Q2 earnings call discusses current and future prospects, including potential future growth and market opportunities, with potential for future developments such as that of Saudi Arabia's Khaled Al-Sheikh.
argos_summary: RumbleOn, Inc. held its Second Quarter 2025 Earnings Call, led by Vice President of Finance Jerene Makia and CEO Michael Quartieri. The call discussed the company's financial results, with details available in a press release and upcoming Form 10-Q filing. It included forward-looking statements about market opportunities and financial performance, along with a reminder of associated risks and uncertainties.
